scripts.export: next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && echo 'pottsphelpswedding.info' >> out/CNAME
scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && NODE_ENV=production next build && NODE_ENV=production next export && touch out/.nojekyll && git add out/ && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-pages: next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && echo pottsphelpswedding.info >> out/CNAME && gh-pages -d out
